name: Zooper Appealing Zooper Zoo
description:
You lucky bastard, you just inherited a zoo from your estranged dutch uncle. The Zoo has seen better days, so it's up to you to turn around the wacky zoo called The Great Fantastic Exellent Zoo. Play around with funny events, deals and much more awaits you. Exellent is netherlandish for excellent or maybe just a dutch who was bad at spelling.

How to play

Drag and drop cards onto the field to play them drag them back to your hand to sell them
(you can't sell housing/encolures)
